member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator
member.summary: This class stores custom validation criteria for record's data.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.RecordDataArgs)
member.summary: Validates record's data using default criteria.
member.param: The data of a new record.
member.exception: Thrown if the parameters "FirstName" or "lastName" are null or contain only white spaces.
Thrown if the parameters "FirstName" or "LastName" shorter than 2 characters or longer than 30 characters.
Thrown if the parameter "DateOfBirth" is earlier than 01.01.1920 or later than the current date.
Thrown if the parameters "AreaCode" and "Savings" are less than 0.
Thrown if the parameter "Gender" is not equal 'F' or 'M'.

member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.DefaultValidator
member.summary: This class stores default validation criteria for record's data.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.DefaultValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.RecordDataArgs)
member.summary: Validates record's data using default criteria.
member.param: The data of a new record.
member.exception: Thrown if the parameters "FirstName" or "lastName" are null or contain only white spaces.
Thrown if the parameters "FirstName" or "LastName" shorter than 2 characters or longer than 60 characters.
Thrown if the parameter "DateOfBirth" is earlier than 01.01.1950 or later than the current date.
Thrown if the parameters "AreaCode" and "Savings" are less than 0.
Thrown if the parameter "Gender" is not equal 'F', 'M' or 'N'.
